document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of squat lobsters of the world (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura-families Chirostylidae, Galatheidae and Kiwaidae)

bibRefCitation.author: Macpherson, E.
bibRefCitation.refString: Macpherson, E. (1994) Crustacea Decapoda: Studies on the genus Munida Leach, 1820 (Galatheidae) in New Caledonia and adjacent waters with descriptions of 56 new species. In: Crosnier, A. (ed.), Resultats des Campagnes MUSORS- TOM, volume 12. Memoires du Museum National d'Histoire Naturelle, Paris, 161, 421 - 569.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Munida typhle Macpherson, 1994: 549
, fig. 60 ( New Caledonia , 1395–1470 m ). —
Macpherson, 1999a: 425
( Vanuatu , 1210–1250 m ). — Macpherson, 2000: 420 ( Marquesas Islands , 850–1000 m ). —
Baba, 2005: 276
(key, synonymies). — Macpherson, 2006a: 325 ( French Polynesia . Austral Archipelago, 500–1300 m ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type data: holotype , male, MNHN Ga 3166
.

, pl. 1 (off south coast of New England , 39º56´N , 70º35´W , 448–1171 m ). —

subSubSection.paragraph:

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Munida vigiliarum Alcock, 1901: 243
( Bay of Bengal off W coast of Andamans near Sentinel Islands, 317– 531 m ). —
Baba , 2005: 276
(key, synonymies).

Not
Munida vigiliarum : Doflein & Balss, 1913: 147
, pl. 13, fig. 2 (SW of Great Nicobar, 362 m (= different species, confirmed by examination of type material of
M. vigiliarum
( Baba , unpublished)). —
Tirmizi, 1966: 201
, fig. 20 (=
M. shaula Macpherson & de Saint Laurent, 2002
).

paragraph.materialsCitation:

317–531 m
.
